summary: A glamorous film star rebels against the studio, her pushy press agent and a family of hangers-on.
cast: Jean Harlow|Lee Tracy|Frank Morgan|Franchot Tone|Pat O'Brien|Una Merkel|Ted Healy|Ivan Lebedeff|Isabel Jewell|Louise Beavers|Leonard Carey|Mary Forbes|C. title: Polvorilla
